title: On the Gromov-Hausdorff Limits of Compact Surfaces with Boundary
abstract:
In this work we investigate Gromov-Hausdorff limits of compact surfaces
carrying length metrics. More precisely, we consider the case where all
surfaces have the same Euler characteristic. We give a complete description of
the limit spaces and study their topological properties. Our investigation
builds on the results of a previous work which treats the case of closed
surfaces.
